answers.answer: lol no they probably won't let you go to sleep. My doctor's office makes all the 3 hour glucose testees in a big waiting room :(
oops, they make us all go wait in a big waiting room lol
at mine fur the 1 hour one they would juss tell us a time to be back at... they didnt care where we went... idk bout the 3 hour one tho :/
They let me come & go in between as long as I was back for the next blood draw. I went to the car & slept with the alarm set on my phone for 10 minutes before the next one.
you guys are so lucky! they won't let us at my dr because they're afraid we'll go eat or puke or something :(
I'm just scared of passing out,,i already don't feel good so idk..
When does the glucose test usually take place? I'm only 10+4 Weeks and a ftm.. just curious as to when I would have to take this test...
I'm 27+6 and i took the 1 hour test one last week so 26 weeks..i think its usually between 22 and 28 weeks..

question: 3 hour glucose test in the morning,, do you think they will let me sleep during the test until I'm needed..because i took the 1 hour one and almost passed out..I'm stopped eating now and I'm getting ready for bed but i dint do good when i haven't ate breakfast..well let me know ladies:) advice and prayers needed that i dint have diabetes.
title: yay..not:/
